attributes.action: Fairer travel and publish justification for traffic light restrictions
attributes.additional_details:
At present, there is no real justification for the decisions being made and the travel restrictions seem like the government are just making easy/quick decisions by pushing restriction on most rather than properly considering.
The government should be putting management policies in place and not just avoidance tactics.
attributes.background:
More transparency in the enforcement of traffic light travel restrictions. 
Be more considerate of British overseas which can not afford the quarantine hotels.
Be more considerate of impact to mental health caused by travel restrictions.
Be more considerate of continued economic devastation.
